TopicTitle: Can somebody make me two textures?

Articles.Content:
I would like somebody to create two textures for me.

1. The Mk3 cockpit without windows and the black piece that is in-between the windows.

2. A texture for the Mk1-2 pod that matches the new huge fuel tanks.

I\'ll release the finished parts in the showcase accrediting you in the thread, and in the author section of the part description.
Sure Ill do it. just send me pictures of the model and outline the meshes, and Ill do an HD texture for you.

Sure Ill do it. just send me pictures of the model and outline the meshes, and Ill do an HD texture for you.

I\'m a bit confused. The models are stock KSP parts, so why would you want pictures of them?
How are we supposed to retexture these? The textures are hidden away in the .mu files.
